input.sentences: i was at a concert that featured a few pop stars ! i first saw [female] [male] .
the sun was beating down | but luckily i had brought an umbrella to protect myself from the rays .
near the end of the concert | i saw beyonce perform ! it was awesome !
output.sentences: I have a preference for male pop stars.
The loud crowd roars with appreciation.
My umbrella protects me from the harmful rays of the sun.
The last person to perform at the concert was Beyonce.
